Distance Learning:
Resources for Students & Families

a.title: click here to access district staff information

span.strong: Latest Information from Dr. Sal 4/9/20 (English, Spanish, Portuguese)
Distance Learning Program Privacy Agreement (English,Spanish, Portuguese)

span.style: vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-family: Tahoma;
font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-family: Tahoma;

span.span: We will be moving to a Distance Learning Model starting March 30th.

span.style: vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-family: Tahoma;

span.span: Teachers and administrators will receive training this week

span.style: font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-family: Tahoma;
vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-family: Tahoma;

span.span: Distance Learning is defined as regular and sustained interactive teaching and learning between teachers and students, remotely. Many of the same high quality resources found on the K12 Interactive Learning Site will continue to be used for practice, in conjunction with Google Classroom. Please continue to use and access this page while teachers get fully set up to deliver instruction in a whole new way. This will be a shift for all involved - parents, students, teachers and administrators.

span.style: font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-family: Tahoma;

span.span: To make all of this work, it is critical that parents have up to date information in the Parent Portal and that students retrieve their Danbury Gmail and Passwords and get connected to teachers by the end of this week and through next week.

span.style: vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-family: Tahoma;

span.span: Laptops, if needed, must be requested through the school immediately as building access and

span.style: vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-family: Tahoma;
vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-family: Tahoma;
text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-family: Tahoma;
vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

a.span: internet access can click HERE for information.

span.style: text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-family: Tahoma;
vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-family: Tahoma;

strong.span: We will no longer mass produce paper packets. We will update parents, staff, and students as we have more information. See how to access the PowerSchool Portal below.

span.style: vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 16px;

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; background-color: rgb(236, 236, 236); font-family: latoregular; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

td.span: The Danbury School District is proud to provide the community and its children with a safe and caring educational environment. Committed to the intellectual and cultural development of our students, we offer not only a quality education but also challenge our students with a variety of academic, athletic and civic-minded opportunities. We believe in preparing our students for a bright future with a standard based and enriched curriculum and the support of dedicated faculty, staff and Board of Education.
